revised_title: Effective Valencies of Transition Metals in Solid Solutions in Gold and Silver Alloys
tldr: The authors investigated the effective valencies of transition metals in solid solutions in gold and silver alloys. They found that the effective valency of transition metals decreases with an increase in electron-to-atom ratio and transition metal content. The results demonstrate the dependence of effective valencies on the exact nature of the environment of the dissolved atoms in these alloys.
